name: 100 Mind Game
storyline:
There is a circular grid of numbers ranging between 0 and 100. There is also a number in the middle the goal is to tap a number in the grid which is the same as or smaller than the middle number. 
 
You can compete against other peoples high scores. 
 
This game will hopefully improve your concentration. 
 
Enjoy!
summary: 100 is a puzzle based numbers game. The aim of the game is to tap a number that is the same or smaller than the middle number. You only get three strikes before it's game over and a timer that gets's progressively faster.
